Document.sentence: The healthcare professional prepares the necessary forms for documentation.
Document.subject: The healthcare professional

Document.sentence: The healthcare professional collects all relevant patient information and medical history.
Document.subject: The healthcare professional
Document.object: all relevant patient information and medical history

Document.sentence: The healthcare professional accurately records the patient's details in the documentation forms.
Document.subject: The healthcare professional
Document.tools: documentation forms, pen or electronic device

Document.sentence: The healthcare professional reviews the completed documentation for accuracy and completeness.
Document.subject: The healthcare professional

Document.sentence: The healthcare professional securely stores the documentation in the patient's medical record.
Document.subject: The healthcare professional
